location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of a letter (not present) from Captain Hollowell to John Barker, British Resident at Aleppo and an extract (also not present) from a private letter from John Hine, Acting Resident at Bagdad. It also notes that the Resident has received authentic intelligence of the arrival of French troops at Tabreeze [Tabriz].
